NAME: The squire
TEXT: Replaces the last attack pair with another random attack pair

NAME: Lady Ingrid
TEXT: Heals the hero based on the remaining protection

NAME: Weak spot
TEXT: Deals 2 extra damage if opponent loses all of the protection

NAME: Gruel
TEXT: If opponent uses special card deal 3 damage (goes through protection)

NAME: Payback
TEXT: Damages the enemy hero based on the remaining protection

NAME: Scout
TEXT: Reveal 4 random cards from the deck

NAME: Bomb
TEXT: Randomly place a bomb to the opponent's special card deck - once revealed deal 3 damage (goes through protection)

NAME: Poison
TEXT: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero for two turns (goes through protection)

NAME: Chain
TEXT: Choose 1 card from opponent's deck to be chained and unable to be used

NAME: Mist
TEXT: Shuffles the opponent's deck after 10 seconds

NAME: Thief
TEXT: Steals random attack pair and replaces it with a corresponding protection pair

NAME: Curse
TEXT: During the opponent's next turn all special cards cost 1 extra coin

NAME: Vortex
TEXT: Both heroes take 5 damage - ends both turns immediately without turn phase (all found pairs are discarded)

NAME: Catapult
TEXT: Completely destroy the opponents shield, but damages your hero in equal amount
